name: Pal Ware
description:
Player 1 uses WASD and player 2 uses the arrow keys.

This is our second game and it was for LM0B Beginners Game Jam #26 which had a "co-op" theme.

This project contains music created by David McKee (ViRiX) soundcloud.com/virix

Ideally we would have liked to have added way more microgames, a timer for each game, and a difficulty system, but we ran out of time for them.

Lead Programmer - Bryan Risher

Lead Artist & Game Design - Domoz/@bird_memes
